name: The Saviour
description:
The Saviour is a 2D platformer focused around navigating a castle and saving the people trapped inside. The game consists of 18 levels and is designed to be quite challenging. The gameplay is revolved around dodging enemies and using them to traverse the level, learning the patterns of enemies and timing jumps are the keys to success.

The story is that the townspeople have been going missing and a traveler passing through decides to investigate. You find a castle with animated gargoyles and slime patrolling and guarding the townsfolk. The traveler helps guide the townspeople out of the castle and find out who is behind the kidnappings.
